definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Teng Biao, a lecturer at China University of Political Science and Law, was arrested the same afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 中国政法大学讲师滕彪当天下午也被逮捕。

sentences.english: Last year a case of shocking murder happened in the Politics and Law University of China.
sentences.chinese: 去年中国政法大学发生一起震惊的凶杀案。

sentences.english: Ma Huaide, a professor at China University of Political Science and Law, likened the laojiao system to an ax.
sentences.chinese: 中国政法大学的马怀德教授把劳教制度比喻为斧头。

sentences.english: Ding Yong, a 21-year-old junior in law at China University of Political Science and Law (CUPL).
sentences.chinese: 21岁的丁勇是中国政法大学法律系大三学生。

sentences.english: Zhang Shoudong Associate Professor, Law School, China University of Political Science and Law, Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 张守东，中国政法大学法学院副教授。

sentences.english: Lecturer, China University of Political Science and Law, Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 张丽清，法学博士，中国政法大学人文学院讲师。

sentences.english: Lawyer Du Haigang, had studied in China University of Politics science and Law successively.
sentences.chinese: 杜海港律师，毕业于中国政法大学，法学硕士。

sentences.english: Professor with Lifetime Tenure, China University of Political Science and Law, Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 张晋藩，中国政法大学终身教授。

sentences.english: Since 2007, study in the law postgraduate courses in China University of Political Science and Law.
sentences.chinese: 2007年在中国政法大学法律研究生课程班进修。

sentences.english: Elva Chen, born in Shaoyang, Hunan Province, was a graduate from China University of Political Science and Laws with English major.
sentences.chinese: 湖南邵阳人，中国政法大学外国语学院英语专业毕业。
